verbs.description: Distilleries in Sevier County [V: are] closely watching Mexico 's tariffs on Tennessee whiskey and other U.S. products . The tariffs are in retaliation to President Trump 's tariff on imported steel and aluminum .

[ARG0: Distilleries in Sevier County] are [ARGM-MNR: closely] [V: watching] [ARG1: Mexico 's tariffs on Tennessee whiskey and other U.S. products] . The tariffs are in retaliation to President Trump 's tariff on imported steel and aluminum .
